content.rendered:
Directed by Sandeep Sai

Written by Sandeep Sai

Star Venkat Reddy (John). Upasana Rc (Pallavi). J. Durai Raj (Jeeva)

Language Tamil

Producers Venkat Reddy

Production Take Ok Productions
